education.description: Focused on digital art, animation, and emerging technologies.

bullets: Authored a complete series of Coat of Arms designs using a Generative AI-assisted workflow.
Integrated AI outputs with manual refinement for professional-grade assets.
Created dynamic game icons and in-game assets.
Designed and created game icons and visual assets.
Contributed significantly to the overall art direction of titles.
Lead brand designer developing strong foundation in visual principles.
Designed UI/UX and web interfaces for AI-driven platforms.
Established core brand guidelines and visual identity.
